Inspirational Quotes.quote: You matter.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Be a voice not an echo.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes.quote: You are the only one who can limit your greatness.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Make the most of yourself….for that is all there is of you.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Inspirational Quotes.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
Inspirational Quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

Inspirational Quotes.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Mark Twain

Inspirational Quotes.quote: You can find a better you inside of you. Why don’t you search for that?
Inspirational Quotes.author: Munia Khan

Inspirational Quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
Inspirational Quotes.author: George Eliot

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

Inspirational Quotes.quote: The true success is the person who invented himself.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Al Goldstein

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Give up on being perfect and start working on becoming yourself.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Steve Jobs

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Whatever you do, do with all your might.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

Inspirational Quotes.quote: You were put on this Earth to achieve your greatest self, to live out your purpose, and to do it courageously.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
Inspirational Quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

Inspirational Quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Walt Disney

Inspirational Quotes.quote: You don’t manifest dreams without taking chances.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Stephen Richards

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Opportunities don’t happen. You create them.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Chris Grosser

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Excuses will always be there for you. Opportunity won’t.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Don’t let your fear decide your future.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Shalane Flanagan

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power you have to take your life in a new direction.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Germany Kent

Inspirational Quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

Inspirational Quotes.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Stop trying to be less of who you are. Let this time in your life cut you open and drain all of the things that are holding you back.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Jennifer Elisabeth

Inspirational Quotes.quote: I’m not telling you it is going to be easy, I’m telling you it’s going to be worth it.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Art Williams

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
Inspirational Quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step into turning the invisible into the visible.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Tony Robbins

Inspirational Quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Inspirational Quotes.quote: The very best thing you can do for the whole world is to make the best of yourself.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Your true success in life begins only when you make the commitment to become excellent at what you do.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Brian Tracy

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Don’t downgrade your dream just to fit your reality. Upgrade your conviction to match your destiny.
Inspirational Quotes.author: John Assaraf

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Don’t be afraid to start over. It’s a brand new opportunity to rebuild what you truly want.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes.quote: No matter who you are, no matter what you did, no matter where you’ve come from, you can always change, & become a better version of yourself.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Madonna

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Free yourself from your past mistakes, by forgiving yourself for what you have done or went through. Every day is another chance to start over.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes.quote: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Socrates

Inspirational Quotes.quote: You cannot afford to live in potential for the rest of your life; at some point, you have to unleash the potential and make your move.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Eric Thomas

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn’t do than by the things you did.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Mark Twain

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart. ― Roy T. Bennett
I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

Inspirational Quotes.quote: If you can tune into your purpose and really align with it, setting goals so that your vision is an expression of that purpose, then life flows much more easily.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Jack Canfield

Inspirational Quotes.quote: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Les Brown

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Learn from the past, set vivid, detailed goals for the future, and live in the only moment of time over which you have any control: now.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Denis Waitley

Inspirational Quotes.quote: You control your future, your destiny. What you think about comes about. By recording your dreams and goals on paper, you set in motion the process of becoming the person you most want to be. Put your future in good hands. Your own.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Set a goal so big that you can’t achieve it until you grow into the person who can.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Start by doing what’s necessary; then do what’s possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Success means doing the best we can with what we have. Success is the doing, not the getting; in the trying, not the triumph. Success is a personal standard, reaching for the highest that is in us, becoming all that we can be.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Limitations live only in our minds. But if we use our imaginations, our possibilities become limitless.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Jamie Paolinetti

Inspirational Quotes.quote: What the mind can conceive and believe, and the heart desire, you can achieve.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Success doesn’t just come and find you, you have to go out and get it.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Les Brown

Inspirational Quotes.quote: Limitations live only in our minds. But if we use our imaginations, our possibilities become limitless.
Inspirational Quotes.author: Jamie Paolinetti

Motivational Quotes.quote: Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
Motivational Quotes.author: Jim Rohn

Motivational Quotes.quote: Tough times don’t last. Tough people do.
Motivational Quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

Motivational Quotes.quote: Difficult roads always lead to beautiful destinations.
Motivational Quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

Motivational Quotes.quote: It’s not about perfect. It’s about effort.
Motivational Quotes.author: Jillian MIchaels

Motivational Quotes.quote: Look in the mirror. That’s your competition.
Motivational Quotes.author: John Assaraf

Motivational Quotes.quote: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
Motivational Quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

Motivational Quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Motivational Quotes.author: Confucius

Motivational Quotes.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
Motivational Quotes.author: George Addair

Motivational Quotes.quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
Motivational Quotes.author: Unknown

Motivational Quotes.quote: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
Motivational Quotes.author: Duke Ellington

Motivational Quotes.quote: Always believe that something wonderful is about to happen.
Motivational Quotes.author: Coco Chanel

Motivational Quotes.quote: Success is what comes after you stop making excuses.
Motivational Quotes.author: Luis Galarza

Motivational Quotes.quote: You will never always be motivated. You have to learn to be disciplined.
Motivational Quotes.author: Unknown

Motivational Quotes.quote: When you know what you want, and want it bad enough, you’ll find a way to get it.
Motivational Quotes.author: Jim Rohn

Motivational Quotes.quote: The best way to gain self-confidence is to do what you are afraid to do.
Motivational Quotes.author: Swati Sharma

Motivational Quotes.quote: You don’t want to look back and know you could have done better.
Motivational Quotes.author: Unknown

Motivational Quotes.quote: A little progress each day adds up to big results.
Motivational Quotes.author: Satya Nani

Motivational Quotes.quote: Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
Motivational Quotes.author: Unknown

Motivational Quotes.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
Motivational Quotes.author: Jim Rohn

Motivational Quotes.quote: Never stop trying. Never stop believing. Never give up. Your day will come.
Motivational Quotes.author: Unknown

Motivational Quotes.quote: Results happen over time, not overnight. Work hard, stay consistent, and be patient.
Motivational Quotes.author: Unknown

Motivational Quotes.quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down. It’s whether you get back up.
Motivational Quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

Motivational Quotes.quote: Success is what happens after you have survived all of your disappointments.
Motivational Quotes.author: Unknown

Motivational Quotes.quote: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
Motivational Quotes.author: Estee Lauder

Motivational Quotes.quote: Don’t try to be perfect. Just try to be better than you were yesterday.
Motivational Quotes.author: Unknown

Motivational Quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
Motivational Quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

Motivational Quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Motivational Quotes.author: Confucius

Motivational Quotes.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
Motivational Quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

Motivational Quotes.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
Motivational Quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Motivational Quotes.quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.
Motivational Quotes.author: Newt Gingrich

Motivational Quotes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
Motivational Quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

Motivational Quotes.quote: Fortune always favors the brave, and never helps a man who does not help himself.
Motivational Quotes.author: P. T. Barnum

Motivational Quotes.quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
Motivational Quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

Motivational Quotes.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
Motivational Quotes.author: Og Mandino

Motivational Quotes.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
Motivational Quotes.author: Maya Angelou

Motivational Quotes.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
Motivational Quotes.author: Joshua Marine

Motivational Quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
Motivational Quotes.author: Winston Churchill

Motivational Quotes.quote: Hard times don’t create heroes. It is during the hard times when the ‘hero’ within us is revealed.
Motivational Quotes.author: Bob Riley

Motivational Quotes.quote: Strength doesn’t come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn’t.
Motivational Quotes.author: Rikki Rogers

Motivational Quotes.quote: We don’t develop courage by being happy every day. We develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.
Motivational Quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

Motivational Quotes.quote: No matter how hard times may get, always hold your head up and be strong; show them you’re not as weak as they think you are.
Motivational Quotes.author: Unknown

Motivational Quotes.quote: Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
Motivational Quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

Motivational Quotes.quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You are able to say to yourself, ‘I lived through this horror. I can take the next thing that comes along.
Motivational Quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Motivational Quotes.quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
Motivational Quotes.author: Helen Keller

Motivational Quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got to keep going.
Motivational Quotes.author: Chantal Sutherland

Motivational Quotes.quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
Motivational Quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

Motivational Quotes.quote: Until you’re broken, you don’t know what you’re made of. It gives you the ability to build yourself all over again, but stronger than ever.
Motivational Quotes.author: Unknown

Motivational Quotes.quote: Good things come to those who believe. Better things come to those who are patient. The best things come to those who never give up.
Motivational Quotes.author: Unknown

Motivational Quotes.quote: When you fear your struggles, your struggles consume you. When you face your struggles, you overcome them.
Motivational Quotes.author: Unknown

Motivational Quotes.quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
Motivational Quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

Motivational Quotes.quote: Success in life comes when you simply refuse to give up, with goals so strong that obstacles, failure, and loss only act as motivation.
Motivational Quotes.author: Unknown

Motivational Quotes.quote: Success is the ability to go from one failure to another with no loss of enthusiasm.
Motivational Quotes.author: Winston Churchill

Motivational Quotes.quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
Motivational Quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

Motivational Quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got to keep going.
Motivational Quotes.author: Chantal Sutherland

Motivational Quotes.quote: Strength doesn’t come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn’t.
Motivational Quotes.author: Rikki Rogers

Motivational Quotes.quote: Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage. If you want to conquer fear, do not sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
Motivational Quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

Positive Quotes.quote: Start each day with a grateful heart.
Positive Quotes.author: Unknown

Positive Quotes.quote: Train your mind to see the good in any situation.
Positive Quotes.author: Unknown

Positive Quotes.quote: We become what we think about.
Positive Quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

Positive Quotes.quote: Once you choose hope, anything’s possible.
Positive Quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

Positive Quotes.quote: Be patient, good things are coming your way.
Positive Quotes.author: Unknown

Positive Quotes.quote: Don’t let the past steal your present.
Positive Quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

Positive Quotes.quote: A man sees in the world what he carries in his heart.
Positive Quotes.author: Goethe

Positive Quotes.quote: Pessimism leads to weakness, optimism to power.
Positive Quotes.author: William James

Positive Quotes.quote: Attitude will always define who we are in life.
Positive Quotes.author: Mark A. Brennan

Positive Quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
Positive Quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

Positive Quotes.quote: Don’t think about what might go wrong. Think about what might go right.
Positive Quotes.author: Unknown

Positive Quotes.quote: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
Positive Quotes.author: Unknown

Positive Quotes.quote: One small positive thought in the morning can change your whole day.
Positive Quotes.author: Unknown

Positive Quotes.quote: Your problem isn’t the problem, it’s your attitude about the problem.
Positive Quotes.author: Ann Brashares

Positive Quotes.quote: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
Positive Quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

Positive Quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine and shadows will fall behind you.
Positive Quotes.author: Walt Whitman

Positive Quotes.quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
Positive Quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

Positive Quotes.quote: Your mind is a powerful thing. When you fill it with positive thoughts, your life will start to change.
Positive Quotes.author: Unknown

Positive Quotes.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
Positive Quotes.author: Stephen Covey

Positive Quotes.quote: If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude.
Positive Quotes.author: Maya Angelou

Positive Quotes.quote: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.
Positive Quotes.author: Dalai Lama

Positive Quotes.quote: If you believe it will work out, you’ll see opportunities. If you believe it won’t, you will see obstacles.
Positive Quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

Positive Quotes.quote: Spend more of your time on what gives you energy and less of your time on what takes it away.
Positive Quotes.author: Unknown

Positive Quotes.quote: You can’t always control what goes on outside, but you can always control what goes on inside.
Positive Quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

Positive Quotes.quote: Whatever you hold in your mind on a consistent basis is exactly what you will experience in your life.
Positive Quotes.author: Tony Robbins

Positive Quotes.quote: Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, shift your energy to what you can create.
Positive Quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

Positive Quotes.quote: Optimism is a happiness magnet. If you stay positive, good things and good people will be drawn to you.
Positive Quotes.author: Mary Lou Retton

Positive Quotes.quote: You have to be at your strongest when you’re feeling at your weakest.
Positive Quotes.author: Unknown

Positive Quotes.quote: Look for something positive in each day, even if some days you have to look a little harder.
Positive Quotes.author: Unknown

Positive Quotes.quote: Whatever is worrying you right now, forget about it. Take a deep breath, stay positive and know that things will get better.
Positive Quotes.author: Unknown

Positive Quotes.quote: It’s gonna get harder before it gets easier. But it will get better, you just gotta make it through the hard stuff first.
Positive Quotes.author: Unknown

Positive Quotes.quote: Everything will work out in the end. You don’t need to know how. You just have to trust that it will.
Positive Quotes.author: Unknown

Positive Quotes.quote: In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision.
Positive Quotes.author: Dalai Lama

Positive Quotes.quote: Be so happy that when others look at you they become happy too.
Positive Quotes.author: Unknown

Positive Quotes.quote: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
Positive Quotes.author: Winston Churchill

Positive Quotes.quote: You’re going to go through tough times that’s life. But I say, ‘Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.’ See the positive in negative events.
Positive Quotes.author: Joel Osteen

Positive Quotes.quote: Staying positive does not mean that things will turn out okay. Rather it is knowing that you will be okay no matter how things turn out.
Positive Quotes.author: Unknown

Positive Quotes.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
Positive Quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

Positive Quotes.quote: Gratitude will shift you to a higher frequency, and you will attract much better things.
Positive Quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

Positive Quotes.quote: Life becomes easier and more beautiful when we can see the good in other people.
Positive Quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

Positive Quotes.quote: The positive thinker sees the invisible, feels the intangible, and achieves the impossible.
Positive Quotes.author: Winston Churchill

Positive Quotes.quote: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude.
Positive Quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

Positive Quotes.quote: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
Positive Quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

Positive Quotes.quote: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you’re going to live your life.
Positive Quotes.author: Joel Osteen

Positive Quotes.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
Positive Quotes.author: Maya Angelou

Positive Quotes.quote: The more positive thoughts you have, the better you feel, which causes you to have more positive thoughts, then you feel even better.
Positive Quotes.author: James Borg

Positive Quotes.quote: If you look the right way, you can see that the whole world is a garden.
Positive Quotes.author: Frances Hodgson Burnett

Positive Quotes.quote: Once you begin to take note of the things you are grateful for, you begin to lose sight of the things that you lack.
Positive Quotes.author: Germany Kent

Positive Quotes.quote: Nurture your mind with great thoughts, for you will never go any higher than you think.
Positive Quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

Positive Quotes.quote: If you believe it will work out, you’ll see opportunities. If you believe it won’t, you will see obstacles.
Positive Quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

Positive Quotes.quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
Positive Quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

Positive Quotes.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
Positive Quotes.author: Stephen Covey

Positive Quotes.quote: If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude.
Positive Quotes.author: Maya Angelou

Positive Quotes.quote: Be so happy that when others look at you they become happy too.
Positive Quotes.author: Unknown

Success Quotes.quote: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
Success Quotes.author: Estee Lauder

Success Quotes.quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
Success Quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

Success Quotes.quote: Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
Success Quotes.author: Unknown

Success Quotes.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
Success Quotes.author: Peter Drucker

Success Quotes.quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
Success Quotes.author: Tony Robbins

Success Quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day-in and day-out.
Success Quotes.author: Robert Collier

Success Quotes.quote: The harder the struggle, the more glorious the triumph.
Success Quotes.author: Unknown

Success Quotes.quote: Self-belief and hard work will always earn you success.
Success Quotes.author: Virat Kohli

Success Quotes.quote: Work hard in silence. Let success make the noise.
Success Quotes.author: Unknown

Success Quotes.quote: If you get tired, learn to rest, not quit.
Success Quotes.author: Unknown

Success Quotes.quote: Don’t stop until you’re proud.
Success Quotes.author: Unknown

Success Quotes.quote: If you can dream it, then you can achieve it.
Success Quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

Success Quotes.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
Success Quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

Success Quotes.quote: Focus on your goal. Don’t look in any direction but ahead.
Success Quotes.author: Unknown

Success Quotes.quote: Success doesn’t just come and find you, you have to go out and get it.
Success Quotes.author: Unknown

Success Quotes.quote: Failure is not the opposite of success. Its part of success.
Success Quotes.author: Unknown

Success Quotes.quote: Success consists of getting up just one more time than you fall.
Success Quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

Success Quotes.quote: Create a vision that makes you wanna jump out of bed in the morning.
Success Quotes.author: Unknown

Success Quotes.quote: Success is what happens after you have survived all of your disappointments.
Success Quotes.author: Unknown

Success Quotes.quote: When it gets difficult is often right before you succeed.
Success Quotes.author: Jeffrey Walker

Success Quotes.quote: If you want it, you’ll find a way. If you don’t, you’ll find an excuse.
Success Quotes.author: Unknown

Success Quotes.quote: Success is simple. Do what’s right, the right way, at the right time.
Success Quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasgow

Success Quotes.quote: We are never in lack of money. We lack people with dreams who can die for those dreams.
Success Quotes.author: Jack Ma

Success Quotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
Success Quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

Success Quotes.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
Success Quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

Success Quotes.quote: There is no elevator to success. You have to take the stairs.
Success Quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

Success Quotes.quote: Push yourself because no one else is going to do it for you.
Success Quotes.author: Unknown

Success Quotes.quote: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Success Quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

Success Quotes.quote: When you find your why, you find a way to make it happen.
Success Quotes.author: Eric Thomas

Success Quotes.quote: I survived because the fire inside me burned brighter than the fire around me.
Success Quotes.author: Joshua Graham

Success Quotes.quote: Don’t worry about failure; you only have to be right once.
Success Quotes.author: Drew Houston

Success Quotes.quote: Whenever you see a successful business, someone once made a courageous decision.
Success Quotes.author: Peter Drucker

Success Quotes.quote: If it doesn’t challenge you, it won’t change you.
Success Quotes.author: Unknown

Success Quotes.quote: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
Success Quotes.author: Steve Jobs

Success Quotes.quote: I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
Success Quotes.author: Michael Jordan

Success Quotes.quote: The struggle you’re in today is developing the strength you need for tomorrow.
Success Quotes.author: Unknown

Success Quotes.quote: Strength is the product of struggle. You must do what others don’t to achieve what others wont.
Success Quotes.author: Henry Rollins

Success Quotes.quote: A dream does not become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
Success Quotes.author: Colin Powell

Success Quotes.quote: Successful people build each other up. They inspire, motivate, and push each other. Unsuccessful people just hate, blame, and complain.
Success Quotes.author: Unknown

Success Quotes.quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
Success Quotes.author: Pele

Success Quotes.quote: Success means doing the best we can with what we have. Success is the doing, not the getting; in the trying, not the triumph. Success is a personal standard, reaching for the highest that is in us, becoming all that we can be.
Success Quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

Success Quotes.quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
Success Quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

Success Quotes.quote: When obstacles arise, you change your direction to reach your goal, you do not change your decision to get there.
Success Quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

Success Quotes.quote: The greatest danger for most of us is not that our aim is too high and we miss it, but that it is too low and we reach it.
Success Quotes.author: Michaelangelo

Success Quotes.quote: Your hardest times often lead to the greatest moments of your life. Keep going. Tough situations build strong people in the end.
Success Quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

Success Quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
Success Quotes.author: Winston Churchill

Success Quotes.quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
Success Quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

Success Quotes.quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
Success Quotes.author: Robert F. Kennedy

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Sarah Louise Delany

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Don’t wait. Life goes faster than you think.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Life is just a chance to grow a soul.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: A. Powell Davies

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Experience is the teacher of all things.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Julius Caesar

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Life is a process. We are a process. The universe is a process.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Anne Wilson Schaef

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Don’t dream your life, live your dream.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: William Skakespeare

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Where there is love there is life.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Life is a long lesson in humility.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: James M. Barrie

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Stephen King

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: It is less about becoming a better person, and more of being better, as a person.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: J.R. Rim

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Rumi

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Anaïs Nin

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Breathe. It’s just a bad day, not a bad life.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: E.E. Cummings

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Steve Jobs

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Never underestimate the power you have to take your life in a new direction.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Germany Kent

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Mark Twain

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Charles R. Swindoll

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Life becomes easier and more beautiful when we can see the good in other people.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Roy T. Bennett

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Albert Einstein

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: George Bernard Shaw

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Khalil Gibran

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Don’t be afraid your life will end. Be afraid that it will never begin.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Grace Hansen

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: You can’t litter negativity everywhere and then wonder why you’ve got a trashy life.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Life isn’t as serious as the mind makes it out to be.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Eckhart Tolle

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Every next level of your life will demand a different version of you.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Life is fragile. We’re not guaranteed a tomorrow so give it everything you’ve got.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Tim Cook

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Muhammad Ali

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Joshua Marine

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Without rain nothing grows. Learn to embrace the storms of your life.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: You have to fight through some bad days to earn the best days of your life.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Remember that just because you hit bottom doesn’t mean you have to stay there.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Robert Downey Jr

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: In the end, it’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Abraham Lincoln

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: It’s not enough to have lived. We should be determined to live for something.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Winston S. Churchill

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Charles Darwin

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Enjoy the little things in life because one day you’ll look back and realize they were the big things.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: By making yourself a life-long learner you’ll keep discovering new and exciting things about yourself and others.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Rachel Robins

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Who you spend your time with will have a great impact on what kind of life you live. Spend time with the right people.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Joel Osteen

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Happiness is letting go of what you think your life is supposed to look like and enjoying it for everything that it is.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Mandy Hale

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Lucille Ball

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Do not wish to be anything but what you are, and try to be that perfectly.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: St Francis of De Sales

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: There are many things in life that will catch your eye, but only a few will catch your heart… pursue those.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Michael Nolan

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: If you can see yourself as an artist, and you can see that your life is your own creation, then why not create the most beautiful story for yourself?
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Miguel Ruiz

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Free yourself from your past mistakes, by forgiving yourself for what you have done or went through. Every day is another chance to start over.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: As I look back on my life, I realize that every time I thought I was being rejected from something good, I was actually being re-directed to something better.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: In essence, if we want to direct our lives, we must take control of our consistent actions. It’s not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives, but what we do consistently.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Tony Robbins

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: If you are going through some hardships, then the first thing you must do is welcome the challenge into your life as an opportunity to learn and grow.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Life chips away at us all. Some play the victim. Some choose to be a survivor. And then there are those who choose to conquer.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: You cannot afford to live in potential for the rest of your life; at some point, you have to unleash the potential and make your move.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Eric Thomas

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you’re going to live your life.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Joel Osteen

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Mark Twain

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: You must first be who you really are, then do what you need to do, in order to have what you want.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Margaret Young

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: The purpose of life is to discover your gift. The work of life is to develop it. The meaning of life is to give your gift away.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: David Viscott

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: You’re only here for a short visit. Don’t hurry, don’t worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Walter Hagen

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life to be happy, it’s all that matters.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Audrey Hepburn

Inspirational Quotes About Life.quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
Inspirational Quotes About Life.author: Helen Keller

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: You can if you think you can.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: George Reeves

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Live your life for you.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: You are your only limit.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: The past does not equal the future.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Tony Robbins

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Decide what matters most to you and do it.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: When it comes to success, there are no shortcuts.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Bo Bennett

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Dream without fear. Love without limits.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Dilip Bathija

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Confucius

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Do what makes you happy.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: You are enough, just as you are.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Life is too short to spend it at war with yourself.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Life’s a journey not a race.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Meir Ezra

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: When it rains look for rainbows.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Inhale confidence. Exhale doubt.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Listen to your heart, it knows everything.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Anne Frank

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Self confidence is the best outfit.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Life is short, smile while you still have teeth.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Throw kindness around like confetti.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Smile, it’s free therapy.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Douglas Horton

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Choose kindness and laugh often.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: You are somebody’s reason to smile.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Shine like the whole universe is yours.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Rumi

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Happiness is not out there, it’s in you.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Kindness is free. Sprinkle that stuff everywhere.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Mistakes are proof that you are trying.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Being happy never goes out of style.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Life is a one time offer, use it well.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Choose kindness and laugh often.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Inspirational Quotes.quote: Everywhere you go, take a smile with you.
Short Inspirational Quotes.author: Sasha Azevedo

Words Of Encouragement.quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Words Of Encouragement.quote: To change the world takes time; to change yourself takes courage.
Words Of Encouragement.author: R.S. Lowel

Words Of Encouragement.quote: The best time for new beginnings, is now.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Words Of Encouragement.quote: Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Words Of Encouragement.quote: Trust the process.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Words Of Encouragement.quote: Life is tough, my darling, but so are you.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Stephanie Bennett-Henry

Words Of Encouragement.quote: Focus on your goal. Don’t look in any direction but ahead.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Words Of Encouragement.quote: Rise up. Start fresh, and see the bright opportunity in each day.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Words Of Encouragement.quote: Never stop trying. Never stop believing. Never give up. Your day will come.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Words Of Encouragement.quote: If you feel like giving up, just look back on how far you are already.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Words Of Encouragement.quote: Don’t stop until you’re proud.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Words Of Encouragement.quote: Sometimes the bravest thing you can do is to keep going when you really feel like giving up.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Words Of Encouragement.quote: You are stronger than you think.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Words Of Encouragement.quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Billie Jean King

Words Of Encouragement.quote: The harder the struggle, the more glorious the triumph.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Words Of Encouragement.quote: Never quit.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Words Of Encouragement.quote: If you stumble get back up.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Words Of Encouragement.quote: What happened yesterday no longer matters.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Words Of Encouragement.quote: Today’s another day.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Words Of Encouragement.quote: So get back on track and
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Words Of Encouragement.quote: Move closer to your dreams and goals.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Words Of Encouragement.quote: You can do it.
Words Of Encouragement.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.quote: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.quote: Never give up, stay focused, stay positive, stay strong.
Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.quote: You’ve got to be willing to lose everything to gain yourself.
Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.author: Iyanla Vanzant

Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.quote: Success in life comes when you simply refuse to give up, with goals so strong that obstacles, failure, and loss only act as motivation.
Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.quote: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.quote: Don’t downgrade your dream just to fit your reality. Upgrade your conviction to match your destiny.
Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.quote: You don’t manifest dreams without taking chances.
Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.author: Stephen Richards

Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.quote: Have faith in the universe and its capability to lead you to the path of abundance.
Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.author: Stephen Richards

Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.quote: Set a goal that makes you want to jump out of bed in the morning.
Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.author: Unknown

Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.quote: When you know what you want, and want it bad enough, you’ll find a way to get it.
Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.author: Jim Rohn

Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.quote: The greatest lesson of life is that you are responsible for your life.
Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.author: Oprah Winfrey

Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.quote: You are never to old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.author: C.S. Lewis

Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.quote: When you accomplish the impossible then you can achieve anything.
Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.author: Stephen Richards

Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.quote: Push yourself because no one else is going to do it for you.
Inspirational Quotes For Encouragement.author: Unknown

Short Encouraging Quotes.quote: I don’t make excuses. I make results.
Short Encouraging Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Encouraging Quotes.quote: A little progress each day adds up to big results.
Short Encouraging Quotes.author: Unknown

Short Encouraging Quotes.quote: Let your past make you better, not bitter.
Don’t call it a dream. Call it a plan.
Every accomplishment begins with the decision to try.
When the ‘why’ is clear, the ‘how’ is easy.
The starting point of all achievement is desire.
Short Encouraging Quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

Short Encouraging Quotes.quote: Train your mind to see the good in any situation.
Keep your head up. God gives his hardest battles to his strongest soldiers.
Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
If you get tired, learn to rest, not quit.
Every moment is a fresh beginning.
Short Encouraging Quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

Short Encouraging Quotes.quote: To be the best, you must be able to handle the worst.
Short Encouraging Quotes.author: Wilson Kanadi

Short Encouraging Quotes.quote: Believe and act as if it were impossible to fail.
Short Encouraging Quotes.author: Charles Kettering

Positive Encouraging Quotes.quote: Don’t regret the past, just learn from it.
Positive Encouraging Quotes.author: Ben Ipock

Positive Encouraging Quotes.quote: If you are positive, you’ll see opportunities instead of obstacles.
Positive Encouraging Quotes.author: Widad Akrawi

Positive Encouraging Quotes.quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
Positive Encouraging Quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

Positive Encouraging Quotes.quote: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
Positive Encouraging Quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

Positive Encouraging Quotes.quote: Focus on your goal. Don’t look in any direction but ahead.
Your positive action combined with positive thinking results in success.
There is nothing more beautiful than believing in yourself.
Positive Encouraging Quotes.author: Sam Kao

Positive Encouraging Quotes.quote: Everything you need to accomplish your goals is already in you.
There’s something in you that the world needs.
When you feel like quitting think about why you started.
You are stronger than you think.
Tough times don’t last. Tough people do.
It never gets easier. You just get better.
Courage is taking those first steps toward your dreams even if you can’t see the path ahead.
Be strong when you are weak, brave when you are scared, and humble when you are victorious.
Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
Positive Encouraging Quotes.author: Og Mandino
